snippet: After a comfortable, across-the-board victory Tuesday, state Republican leaders proudly affirmed their conservatism and said the party should follow suit.
abstract: Republican leaders in Kansas proudly affirm their conservatism by sending message to their party that Republicans can win on principles after comfortable, across-the-board victory for candidates in midterm elections; re-elections of Gov Sam Brownback and Sen Pat Roberts reinforce belief of state Republicans that they are charting way for their party nationwide.
lead_paragraph: After a comfortable, across-the-board victory Tuesday, state Republican leaders proudly affirmed their conservatism and said the party should follow suit.

headline.main: Kansas’ Advice to Republicans: Stay to the Right
headline.print_headline: Kansas’ Advice to Republicans: Stay to the Right
